t:
As I switch off the lights and prepare to sleep, I see the dark silhouette of my cat on the window sill against the night sky.

                  He stretches his legs to get
                                        comfortable.



  But last I checked, he had four legs,
                     NOT eight!
c:
Spider-cat.
The mutation is getting stranger.



#night #sleep #cat #monster #legs #fear #nosleep #comfortable
